entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:51 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 1:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
